Random Up-Traits?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Random Up-Traits?
By verystrait42 on Saturday, February 21, 2009 - 04:53 pm:

Today I was raising a Joker, had been rasing him for 3 weeks. 2 weeks I did self power training, one fail one succede. I then rested and fed him vitamins. I looked to see if he had gotten the glutton trait (of course he had) and was very supprised when I looked and it said he had "Up IQ". I had done nothing to even touch his IQ and I know he didnt have it after being shrined. Could there be a chance that monsters will aquire this trait randomly. I can think of no reason he should have it, but he does. He is first generation, shrined using the pass "+jhR" found in the password section. Post if you have any suggestions as to why this happened, or if something similar has happened to you.

By Gearhead on Thursday, May 12, 2011 - 07:41 pm:

If IQ is his highest state it will automatically give it that trait.
